mapper.insert: insert into info_trade values(info_num.nextval, #{user_id}, sysdate, #{info_cate}, #{info_title}, #{info_content}, null,#{info_fee}, #{info_lat}, #{info_lng}, #{info_brief})
mapper.select: select info_content from info_trade where info_num=#{info_num}
select count(info_num) from trade_his where info_num = #{info_num}
select * from trade_his where user_id=#{user_id} and info_num=#{info_num}
mapper.insert: insert into trade_his(his_num, user_id, info_num, info_cate) values(his_num_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{info_num}, #{info_cate})
mapper.select: select * from info_trade where info_num in ( select info_num from( select info_num from trade_his where trade_cate = #{info_cate} group by info_num order by count(info_num) desc) where rownum <= 5)
select * from info_trade where info_num in ( select info_num from( select info_num from trade_his where trade_cate = #{info_cate} group by info_num order by count(info_num) desc) where rownum <= 2)
